WorkItem.Description:
It seems to bee 
NAudio.Wave.WaveInCapabilities.MaxProductNameLength = 32;
is not long enough in some situations.

If you want to display this to the user then it looks a bit strange.
thanks for reading this.

*Sebastian

Comments.Message: It is not possible to change this value. It's part of the Windows SDK. It's a very frustrating and long-standing issue with the old waveIn APIs. There are various workarounds to try to get hold of the non-truncated device names, but nothing that always works.
